text:
[Verse]
Under the sky so wide
Shining stars in our eyes
Dreamers together we fly
Whispered secrets in the night

[Verse 2]
Moonlight kisses so bright
Hold me close til first light
Lost in the moment just right
Wishes take us to new heights

[Chorus]
Oh oh we glide through dreams
Oh oh under moonbeams
Oh oh nothing’s as it seems
Oh oh love’s endless streams

[Verse 3]
Silhouettes against the glow
Hand in hand we don't know
Where the night may gently flow
Heartbeats keep the tempo slow

[Bridge]
Darkness fades the dawn's near
Sweet melodies we hear
Together no more fear
Our path becomes so clear

[Chorus]
Oh oh we glide through dreams
Oh oh under moonbeams
Oh oh nothing’s as it seems
Oh oh love’s endless streams
title: Moonlight Wishes
